title: Find the Gradient
question_text: A line goes through the coordinates (4, 5) and  (7, 11) . What is the gradient of the line?
A line goes through the coordinates (1, 5) and  (3, 11) . What is the gradient of the line?
A line goes through the coordinates (1, 6) and  (7, 12) . What is the gradient of the line?
A line goes through the coordinates (3, 6) and  (5, 12) . What is the gradient of the line?
A line goes through the coordinates (1, 4) and  (3, 12) . What is the gradient of the line?
A line goes through the coordinates (4, 2) and  (9, 12) . What is the gradient of the line?
A line goes through the coordinates (3, 2) and  (1, 6) . What is the gradient of the line?
A line goes through the coordinates (5, -1) and  (7, 11) . What is the gradient of the line?
A line goes through the coordinates (-3, 4) and  (-7, 16) . What is the gradient of the line?
